text: Richárd Nagy (born 8 April 1994) is a Hungarian professional footballer who plays for Kaposvári Rákóczi FC. ==Club statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%; text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Europe !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |-||-||-||-|- |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Veresegyháza |- |2013–14 |14||2||0||0||–||–||14||2 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background- color:#eeeeee;" |Total||14||2||0||0||0||0||14||2 |- |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Balatonfüred |- |2014–15 |14||6||0||0||–||–||14||6 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background-color:#eeeeee;" |Total||14||6||0||0||0||0||14||6 |- |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Dorog |- |2015–16 |22||2||3||2||–||–||25||4 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background- color:#eeeeee;" |Total||22||2||3||2||0||0||25||4 |- |rowspan="6" valign="center"|Vác |- |2013–14 |8||1||4||1||–||–||12||2 |- |2014–15 |3||0||1||1||–||–||4||1 |- |2016–17 |23||0||2||1||–||–||25||1 |- |2017–18 |21||4||1||1||–||–||22||5 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background- color:#eeeeee;" |Total||55||5||8||4||0||0||63||9 |- |rowspan="4" valign="center"|Kaposvár |- |2018–19 |25||6||2||0||–||–||27||6 |- |2019–20 |29||3||4||2||–||–||33||5 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background- color:#eeeeee;" |Total||54||9||6||2||0||0||60||11 |- |- style="font- weight:bold; background-color:#eeeeee;" |rowspan="2" valign="top"|Career Total | |159||24||17||8||0||0||176||32 |} Updated to games played as of 27 June 2020. ==References== ==External links== *MLSZ *Soccerway Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Budapest Category:Hungarian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Vác FC players Category:Dorogi FC footballers Category:Kaposvári Rákóczi FC players Category:Nemzeti Bajnokság I players
